column4: Hi! I booted from ubuntu live cd i burned and chose the check disc for errors. It completed and showed no errors, but now i cant boot to windows(thats only os this pc has) It says GRUB Error Stage15(i think it's 15)
i have no ubuntu...
ï»¿but now i cant boot to windows(thats only os this pc has)
so hard drives are ntfs and all plain windows
google "fixmbr", ##windows for windows support
well this was not windows issue on my opinion well not fully so i thought i ask here this is more freindly than windows channel, thank you
you need to run fixmbr from the windows install disk, they'll help you out in #windows
I'm correct in understanding that you don't want to use ubuntu right?
not yet, and only fual boot
i need windows tomorrow for couple hours then i reinstall it and intall ubuntu as dual boot
pastebin the entire output of 'sudo apt-get update' and the contents of /etc/apt/sources.list
please pastebin it...
output of 'ls /etc/apt/sources.list.d/'
playdeb, medibuntu, winehq
you need to put my name in your response if you want to be sure I notice it.  Get rid of playdeb
why? it has worked fine for now, i did google problems with it but weird
https://bugs.launchpad.net/bugs/278635
disown the job after you run it (COMMAND & disown), or use nohup (nohup COMMAND), or use screen
no, not in general.  Use the ubuntu repositories
what exactly is too old?
but is it 1.4.6?
right

just install it (it's in the repositories), add some music to the right directory (check /etc/mpd.conf), add some music to the playlist (you should probably use ncmpc or some other client), and then use mpc to start, stop, play etc...
